jobTitle.titel: Aspiring Full-stack developer and Cybersecurity analyst

about: I am a self-motivated aspiring developer and Coding enthusist.I matriculated from The Leadership College in 2023 and I am currently attending a web-development bootcamp at Life Choices Academy.Beyond my proffesional pursuits, you'll find  me exploring the world of linguistics, learning japenese, arabic and german,trying out different cafe's and spending quality time with family and friends or playing chess.

education.School: Life Choices Academy: Web Development Bootcamp,
education.Experiance: At Life Choices Academy I am learning proffessional and techincal development.The technical curriculum has a focus on Html, CSS, Bootstrap,JavaScript, VueJS, NodeJS, mySQL

education.School: Harvard's Cs50 Introduction to Computer Science
education.Experiance: Cs50x has been a rigourous journey of discovery.Taught mainly by Proffessor David.J Malan the course has a focus on abstraction, algorithms, data structures, encapsulation, resource management, security, software engineering, and web development. Languages include C, Python, SQL, and JavaScript plus CSS and HTML.

education.School: Khan Academy:Computer Science Course: Internet Security
education.Experiance: This course has a focus on the theoretical aspect of computer science. In my opnion it is introductory in nature, and has a focus on algorithms cryptogoraphy and  information theory. The course led me to dicover my love for cryptogoraphy and cyphers.
I attended and matriculated from The Leadership College Mannernberg. My experiance at the school was generally a positive one,

skills.criticalSkill2: Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment
skills.criticalSkill3: Adaptability and willingness to learn new concepts

testimonials.name: Thuthuza
testimonials.testimonial: Nusaibah is kind, helpful and easily approachable. She is amazing to work with, she makes a great team player!

testimonials.name: LamlaNkosi
testimonials.testimonial: Nuisabah is an absolute gem, Calm, kind, and incredibly diligent, she embodies grace and dedication.A true team player, she is always focused on her tasks, ensuring a harmonious work environment. Additionally, she is a great person to talk to, who under pressure, perseveres until the job is done.

testimonials.name: Imraan
testimonials.testimonial: Nusaibah is a remarkable individual, embodying kindness, dedication, and intelligence in every aspect of her life. Her gentle demeanor belies a remarkable resilience and inner strength, inspiring those around her to strive for greatness. It is a privilege to know Nusaibah, and I have no doubt that she will continue to  make a positive impact on the world around her.

testimonials.name: Abdurahman
testimonials.testimonial: Nusaibah is a  dedicated worker that uses her insight to accomplish her goals and help those contribute to those around her.Her commitment and dedication shine through with all that she applies herself at.

testimonials.name: Joel
testimonials.testimonial: Nuaibah is a highly creative, well-behaved, and dedicated individual who thrives on collaborating with her peers and excels at working on project assignments. She has acquired various skills and tools, including HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap,VS Code, and wireframe. I am pleased to introduce her as an exceptional candidate and developer

projects.description: Using Html, CSS and Javascript I made a calculator app
Using Html, CSS and Javascript I made a keyboard app
Using Html and CSS I made a Flip Card App
Using Html, CSS and Javascript I made a bookstore
